oracle text:
8/8
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
At the beginning of your end step, put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.
{U}{B}{T}: Each opponent discards a card and loses 1 life.
